name: Kimberly Davis
text: Great place to bring our 10yr old for Friday night pizza. She loves the arcade afterwards and lately they've been making any pizza we want at our request and fast. This is the only place we've brought her to eat since the pandemic. Highly recommend!

name: Hector Caceres
text: CiCi's is best known for their prices, but not necessarily gourmet pizza. The store is new, and mostly clean, and it appears like the workers take care of it. The clientele is a little strange, and you can expect a lot of kids. You can't ‚Ä¶More

name: J Jackson
text: Reasonable price pizza! I think $3.99 for kids and $8.99 for Adults then you pay for drinks.  Salad bar, Cinnamon & Creme dessert and Every sort of Pizza type you can imagine..if they don't have what you want then you can request it from cook

name: Kassandra Crawford
text: Friendly staff always greet you in the way in with a smile. The food is delicious and the variety is to be commended. Don't have three pizza you're looking for in the buffet? Ask them and they will make a custom pizza that you can have as ‚Ä¶More

name: Kendra Lassiter
text:
Very nice and quiet around this time. The prices  went up since I was a kid. But for a family of 5 39.00 dollars wasn't bad!
It's  still   Buffet style  but the employees serve you.

name: lillian booker
text: First time visiting new location and eating here in a long time. The buffet price went up and it's still an extra charge for a drink. Nevertheless, the variety of pizza choices is my reason for eating here with my teenager. The brownies are still one of my favorite dessert choices.

name: Soul 5578
text: Extremely great food. I have never had any problems with this place. If anything, the games in the game room sometimes mess up but that's not what really matters. The employees put really good effort into making their pizza. Keep up the good work!üòÅ

name: Bryon Baker
text: Easy to get a filling meal here. COVID-19 makes it weird to move around here but the food, the staff and their service, especially on Veterans Day, were great.

name: Christina Richardson
text: LOVED THE FOOD, THE SERVICE WAS GREAT BUT THE GAME ROOM WAS A  NO NO FOR THE KIDS WOULDNT DO THAT AGAIN...

name: jayell 23
text: Great staff they're friendly and give the place a relaxing feel to it!

name: Timothy Hopkins
text: Food was cold and hard. Some of the workers are great and awesome customer service

name: Theo Witherell/Sr
text: the price is more than Anderson s.c. You only have a choice of 5 pizzas .  all others have double that . and people go there to enjoy clean store and good food . not to have political views shoved down our throats.

name: Michael Lewis
text: Pizza literally tasted like plastic. I would not recommend eatting here.

name: Bobby Bellew
text: Maybe its me but it doesn't taste good to me anymore.

name: D Heath
text: For a children's place I really like it. The food is at a good price. The salad bar is very neat and clean. The dressings weren't all over the place. The manager came around and checked on the patrons. The bar had a good variety of pizza.

name: Brandon Sloan
text: This newly opened location is a bast improvement over the old location. Its clean and well maintained.

name: Keandra Thompson
text: I love taking my kids to this CIci‚Äôs pizza . . Joe was very nice and helpful!!!!! Greeted us. Made sure we was okay . The store was very clean!!!!! I would highly recommend to family and friends !

name: Matthew Reid
text: Went in kinda close to closing, good selection, staff was very friendly. Due to covid we were unsure of how we would be served since it is a pizza buffet. The staff served Us whatever we selected and was very professional. I actually liked ‚Ä¶More

name: Jon Dalton
text: Terrible.  Paid for the buffet and was given no information on how or what to do. Plates?  Silverware?  Then when I asked she informed they would have to get those as she continued to do something else.  I the paying guest was clearly a bother. I left without even asking for my money back. So thoroughly disgusted.

name: Peggy Florence
text: All the employees were really nice. I was wanting a salad but when I looked at the lettuce I said no thank you.it was brown and some pic it looked rotten. The pizza was not all that good. All the slices I had the crust was soggy which made out taste raw.

name: Shara Purple Reign Lowe
text: I'm giving them 5 stars just because of Jeffrey alone. His politeness was a given from the time we walked through the door. He took his time and helped me to find the best deal for my bucks. He exhibited the same behavior customer after customer. Young man u deserve 20 stars but 5 is all I'm allotted to give u on this one!

name: TONI Woods
text: Hot and fresh. Salad bar had a lot to choose from.

name: Brian Smith
text: This is the worst pizza I have every had the honor of eating. The pizza box probably tasted better. The staff handled the food without gloves and the place wasn't inviting at all. I really don't know why this place is still in business. If you can only afford a cheap pizza, go to Little Caesars, don't waste your money here.

name: Jamez Si
text: They've upped their game in revent years. They are nice to take requests. Dessert pizzas are really good. Better quality than a Pizza Hut buffett for sure.

name: Blaine Prescott
text: Try to go here during busy hours. It will ensure you get fresh pizza in variety. Just remember you'll have to navigate through hoards of hungry children and adults. The sweet tea carafe located in the dining area will most likely run out, so plan accordingly.

name: Kenneth Baker
text: 1st time going on 2/26/2020 with 4 grandchildren ages 2-10.  Went at 7pm after a school function.  Basically had mostly pepperoni pizza and cheese.  One of grandchildren wanted pasta and wasn't any so requested some and took over 30 minutes ‚Ä¶More

name: justine blair
text: At first I was skeptical cause there was hardly any pizza but they changed that right away. There is this guy Jordan who works there and he completely blew me away as I watched him work. He delivered amazing customer service while keeping ‚Ä¶More

name: Kay Walker
text: I absolutely love cicis. The restaurant was very clean and followed all the social distancing guidelines due to COVID-19.  Manager Joe was absolutely wonderful. Very knowledgeable and has great customer service skills. This was my first dining experience since COVID started and it was great! Please give this man a raise ASAP üëçüèæ

name: Dennis Gordon
text: Pizza and salad how can you go wrong. The atmosphere is nice but its tricky getting into the parking lot. You have two options, go through the sprint gas station entrance and navigate through their traffic or take the left turn behind the ‚Ä¶More

name: lynn evans
text: Employees actually act like they enjoy their job and want to work!

name: Jimmy Mcconnell
text: We love Cici's, it was our first opportunity to go in to the buffet since Covid-19 began. They were using all recommended precautions and were very pleasant.

name: Kimberly G
text: Pizza is super thin but you pay for what you get. My kids love it and my hubs says it's good for what it is. It's a pizza buffet with salad bar and pasta bar. It's not special but if you have a big family and want something easy this is it. They also do military discount which is nice.

name: Dorothy Skoland
text: Most of the selections were 1 or 2 toppings. Macaroni was nasty and overcooked. Sauce was lukewarm. If this was first ever visit, I would not be back

name: Kevin M.
text: First of all, there is no entrance off Wheeler Road.  Secondly, we went during lunch on Friday and there was a large group there from a group home or something. ‚Ä¶More

name: Autumn Watson
text: Love the new look and location.  Pizza was slow about getting replenished.  But gave the 3  stars because the pizza has more flavor and the great selections for a salad. üëç

name: Melissa Killough
text: It's been a while since I've visited a CiCis but the selections are drastically small. There's only like 4 types of pizza out at a time and maybe one dessert.  The best part was the salad bar.

name: Sandy Pool
text: This is like a pizza smorgasbord. They have pizza, of coarse, many different kinds. Plus a pasta bar, and a salad bar. You can also have dessert pizzas. Fun atmosphere!

name: K McClellan
text: This new location is much cleaner than the last. The staff is friendly. Food was good, but my only issue is that the pizza was not coming out fast enough causing lines of people waiting. By the time you reached the front, the pizza was out again causing another wait. Overall not bad!

name: Mandy Davender
text: I have never been to CiCis pizza before. This was my first time here and every one was so welcoming! I had 2 slices of pizza left and asked for a to go container and was advised I had to pay .50 cents per slice of pizza. I had a specialty ‚Ä¶More

name: Amber James Erickson
text: Staff was friendly. Food was served in a very safe way.

name: Samuel Hall
text: Nice and clean. Unable to enjoy the buffet due to covid but still able to order and sit inside.

name: charles baxter
text: Service was great and friendly and the pizza was cooked perfectly!

name: Robert Vitruvian
text: New building comes with new high price. 10.78

name: Latoya Cuyler
text: Friendly staff and great service.  I will be returning!

name: Koki NutHouse
text: The new location is nice. They are pretty good about keeping the buffet stocked with different types of pizzas. For some reason the brownies are always undercooked but look delicious. The game area no longer takes quarters so you have to ‚Ä¶More

name: steve broadwater
text: Fast service on my take out order

name: ANITA PENNINGTON
text: I love this Cicis Pizza it was really good food and staff. Place for the whole family and the arcade games were definitely fun

name: Liz Jones
text: My children love it here. The food is very good considering the prices. If you want to please your children on a budget this is the place to go.

name: Stefanie Knight
text: Love that you can fill out a form for any type of pizza your heart desires,  lots of salad options. Nice bonus having an arcade.

name: Tammy Mitchell
text: I ordered a special pizza( supreme). It's burnt on the edges. Bad bad not happy with this place at all. The people working here are not not very friendly. This is what they call a supreme.

name: Tony Cardullo
text: Big Variety Of Pizzas always Hot and Delicious!!  Good Value!!  Soft Drinks and Tea Are $2.

name: Lonnie Cuyler
text: It was good  perfect .

name: Pamela Ward
text: Price is good, pizza well it is Cicis. Love the cheese sticks with a cup of Alfredo sauce to dip in. Salad bar is good, but has no meat. What got me, was this one gentleman quietly cleaning as people leave messes everywhere, and he was the ‚Ä¶More

name: Richard Stepakof
text: First visit and pleasantly impressed with the new location. Food was good and plentiful.  Nice and clean.  Appreciate their special acknowledgement of Veterans Day 2019.

name: Leslie Martin
text: Very clean nice staff

name: Courtayvian Reese
text: I didn't too much like it just the games never again waste my money on they buffet

name: Kathie Usry
text: Very disappointed in management. I was trying to make arrangements well in advance for 40 students to have an early dinner (5ish) on a Friday night and the manager was not willing to even try to accommodate us. She let me know emphatically that they did not take reservations and it was strictly first come, first serve,

name: Amanda Blount
text: Nasty.  No clean forks. Nobody spoke to me when I walked in. I had to tell them they were out of ice. Over priced for customer service and quality. Won't go back.

name: Will S
text: Service was on time and friendly.  There wings are good for a pizza joint.  The cinnamon roll dessert is delicious.  The pizza was only ok.  The crust reminds of a flat bread more than a pizza crust.  They also go very light on the sauce so ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa McWilliams
text: What's not to love here? My favorite thing that I appreciate is the Apple flavor Fanta soda. Plus their awesome PIZZA!!! üòãü§òüèºü§§üî•üî•üî•

name: Al
text: Very great experience.  Very clean store. My family and I thoroughly enjoyed eating here

name: Tada Yada
text: Enjoyed the pizza and arcade! Kids had a great time and I really like the pizza variety. Will be coming back again.

name: Gary Deariso
text: Basic pizza and decent salad. A good value. What makes it great are their cinnamon rolls!

name: Jane Williams

name: Larry Flanagan
text: Large assortment if you time it right. It's worth the trip and price especially if  you bring a large group of kids.

name: Heather Cartee

name: robert rush
text: Fantastic. Great pizza. The place was so clean and the staff was amazing! Totally worth the drive from Greenville!

name: marcus lucas
text: Not sure if there is a loophole but I looked up Georgia law..and says hairneys must be worn...frizzy headed long haired and dreads all over back there...no nets. Also, they got a 96..not terrible.

name: Summer Shore
text: Went for a friends son bday get together.. Nice crowd overall clean good customer service didn't take long to replace food once it ran out.  Will return

name: Mike Jackson

text: CiCis' is wacked! The pizza is tasty; they will make pizza to order without any additional charge. There's a variety of beverages to choose from. Although the salad bar could be better it's ok!

text: Pizza is good ,Salad bar some of the veggies were old had to wait a while for them to.replace with new ones salad bar is not fresh

text: New location -- much neater presentation and a lot more open space, esp with all the windows

name: Maurice McDonald
text: My family enjoyed themselves as expected. Seating was limited but the place is always crowded. Wish they had built the place bigger. Hmm...a two story Cici with an upper floor. Something to think about!

name: Dana Staley

text: Love the new cicis. It has great location! Wish it had a little more parking space.

name: Katrina Worgull
text: Sunday at 1:45 is a mistake! Waaayyy too crowded. Too small of an eating area & no parking. The guy at the register did say there was a wait but not with "I'm sorry" or a smile or anything. We (a party of 2) had to wait for a table while ‚Ä¶More

text: First time ever going. They have good pizza! Always accommodating to your requests.

name: Kefona Romero

name: Michael T
text: Worse than a typical CiCis. Got there at 1105 and food was already cooled off on the buffet. Only keep 7 pizzas in rotation, anything else you gotta wait for.  Shiny new location, garbage food
